div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2214 Selinunte, 1874 Burial: c. 240-235 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: c. 30 AE. From excavations Sardinia (Isis/3 corn ears) Disposition: Palermo Cavallari, BullCommAntSic 7 (1874), pp. 18 ff.; Archivio storico Siciliano III (1876), pp. 529 ff. Robinson, NC 1943, pp. 6-8
